coindescs.desc: [EndSkillHead] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 10 HP
[EndSkillTail] Heal 10 SP for 2 allies with the least SP
[EndSkillHead] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 12 HP
[EndSkillTail] Heal 12 SP for 2 allies with the least SP
[CriticalEndSkill] Heal the ally with the lowest HP percentage for 6 HP; Heal the ally with the least SP for 6 SP
[EndSkillHead] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 15 HP
[EndSkillTail] Heal 15 SP for 2 allies with the least SP
[CriticalEndSkill] Heal the ally with the lowest HP percentage for 8 HP; Heal the ally with the least SP for 8 SP

levelList.name: Cavernous Wailing

<style="highlight">- At 4+ highest Reson., deal +(5 + (the sum of [Vibration] Potency and Count on target)/2)% more damage instead (max 35%)</style>
